name: gatb-core
description: GATB - The Genome Analysis Toolbox with de-Bruijn graph

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependent_to.name: lordec
dependent_to.description:
LoRDEC is a program to correct sequencing errors in long reads from 3rd
generation sequencing with high error rate, and is especially intended
for PacBio reads.
